title: Elana Scherr (Car and Driver, Road Kill, author, wrench!)
description:
Elana Scherr wears many hats in the automotive space. She's written for just about all the magazines, was the Editor of Road Kill (the magazine and website), hosts videos for Edmunds, and does her own wrenching (ok, sometimes her husband Tom helps, when he's not repairing a dump truck, for fun). She reviews new cars but only owns old ones. She's an incredibly nice badass. 

Watch Elana's YouTube channel!  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCl4xusWg6NCYBuU9UGFUCxQ

Follow here: @challengeher

https://www.edmunds.com/about/authors/elana-scherr.html

Read her articles: https://www.caranddriver.com/author/223081/elana-scherr/

Buy her book! https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/52979409-don-the-snake-prudhomme

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/pkz0wvUv6yY
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
